source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_001<tab>Greetings, friend. I am E<var 1F /var>Una<var 1F /var>Kotor. A Padjal of Gridania, as you might have discerned from the horns on my head. An unnatural presence has made itself known here in the Twelveswood, and I have been summoned to investigate. Tread carefully, and may the elementals watch over you.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_001<tab>Je m'appelle E-Una-Kotor, et comme vous pouvez le constater, je suis un Padjal. C'est la perception d'une présence menaçante qui m'a amené ici. Je vous conseille donc d'être vigilant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> si vous vous aventurez dans la forêt.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_010<tab>Greetings, friend. I am E<var 1F /var>Una<var 1F /var>Kotor, a Padjal of Gridania. As you may have noticed, the Wood Wailers have begun an exploratory survey of the strange labyrinth recently discovered in the ruins of Gelmorra. Strange forces are at work here, and I have come to see the Wood Wailers are safe from harm.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_010<tab>Je suis ici afin d'apporter mon soutien aux vigiles sombres et aux aventuriers comme vous dans l'exploration du soi-disant Palais des morts. N'hésitez donc pas à faire appel à moi si vous avez besoin d'aide.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_020<tab>Pray go on ahead to Issom-Har. I would first see what insight the elementals might grant me now that the architect of the palace is no more.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_020<tab>Je vais moi aussi me rendre à Issom-Har. Si mon intuition est juste, j'aurai cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment besoin de votre don...

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_030<tab>Though the sorcerer is vanquished, there is still much of the Palace of the Dead we have yet to uncover. I should hope you will continue your exploration of its depths.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_030<tab>Même si celui qui a créé le Palais des morts a été annihilé, il reste encore beaucoup de choses que nous ignorons sur cet étrange labyrinthe souterrain. Je compte sur vous pour continuer à nous aider à lever le voile sur ce mystère.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_START_MENU_TITLE<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_START_SHOP<tab>Exchange artifacts.
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_START_SHOP2<tab>Request to keep your aetherpool gear.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_START_SHOP2<tab>Emporter une arme hors du Palais des morts

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_START_EXCHANGE<tab>Forge an aetherpool grip.
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_START_EXPLAIN<tab>Learn more.
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_START_EXIT<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_130<tab>You wish to use your aetherpool arm <var 1A 02 /var>outside<var 1A 01 /var> the Palace of the Dead? I apologize, but I cannot in good conscience deprive you of the means to defend yourself in the ruins. I sense there is yet much to be discovered.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_130<tab>Vous voulez utiliser les substrats en dehors du Palais des morts<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Je crains toutefois qu'ils aient besoin d'être exposés davantage à l'atmosphère des ruines gelmorraines pour cela. Vous devriez sans doute essayer d'y pénétrer plus pro<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dé<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_131<tab>You must first clear floor 50 in order to use aetherpool gear outside the Palace of the Dead.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_131<tab>Pour transformer les substrats magiques en arme, il est nécessaire d'avoir déjà conquis le 50e sous-sol du Palais des morts.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_100_020<tab>You wish to use your aetherpool weapon <var 1A 02 /var>outside<var 1A 01 /var> the Palace of the Dead? Hmmm... It is clear you have channeled a considerable amount of aether into it after so many expeditions into the ruins. Perhaps a portion of its energies can be siphoned off and stabilized to be used outside of the ruins.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_100_020<tab>Vos substrats ont suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment accumulé d'éther pour que je puisse en extraire une partie et le cristalliser. Cela devrait me permettre de créer une arme que vous pourrez utiliser hors du Palais des morts.

source:
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_EXCHANGE_MENU_TITLE<tab>Forge an aetherpool grip?
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The strength of your aetherpool arm and armor will be reduced by 10.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_EXCHANGE_MENU_TITLE<tab>Créer <var 33 ((Item)) 02F25A7D0202 /var><var 1D /var>?
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>* Les degrés d'amélioration seront chacun réduits de 10 points.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_110_020<tab>You wish to siphon strength from your aetherpool arm for use <var 1A 02 /var>outside<var 1A 01 /var> the Palace of the Dead? I apologize, but I cannot in good conscience allow you to leave yourself vulnerable in the ruins. I sense there is yet much to be discovered.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_110_020<tab>Vous voulez cristalliser une partie de l'éther accumulé dans vos substrats<var 1D /var>? Je vous rappelle que votre mission est d'enquêter sur l'origine du Palais des morts, et il semblerait que vous ne soyez pas encore parvenu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à élucider les mystères qui l'entourent...

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_110_021<tab>You must first clear floor 50 in order to forge an aetherpool grip.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_110_021<tab>Pour créer <var 33 ((Item)) 02F25A7D0202 /var>, vous devez avoir franchi le sous-sol 50 du Palais des morts.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_120_020<tab>You wish to siphon strength from your aetherpool arm for use <var 1A 02 /var>outside<var 1A 01 /var> the Palace of the Dead? I am afraid such an endeavor would prove folly. Anything drawn from your arm now would lack the strength to maintain a physical form outside of the ruins.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_120_020<tab>Vous voulez cristalliser une partie de l'éther accumulé dans vos substrats<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Je crains hélas qu'ils ne contiennent pas assez de cette énergie. Vous devriez continuer de les exposer à l'atmosphère du Palais des morts.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_120_021<tab>In order to forge an aetherpool grip, both your aetherpool weapon and armor must have attained a minimum strength of +10.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_120_021<tab>Pour créer <var 33 ((Item)) 02F25A7D0202 /var>, chacun de vos substrats magiques doit avoir au moins atteint le degré d'amélioration 10.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_ABOUT_MENU_TITLE<tab>What will you ask?
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_START_ABOUT_TOKEN<tab>What is there to be found in the ruins?
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_START_ABOUT<tab>Can aetherpool arms be used outside of the ruins?
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_START_ABOUT<tab>Emporter une arme hors du Palais des morts

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_START_YOURSELF<tab>What do you do here?
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_ABOUT_BACK<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_180<tab>Though they are but fragments, many of the artifacts discovered in the Palace of the Dead appear to have absorbed traces of dark and ancient magicks. I daresay they may be key in discerning the true nature of the labyrinth.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_180<tab>Les vigiles sombres m'ont dit avoir aperçu des objets comme des poteries gelmorraines à l'intérieur du Palais des morts. Bien que la plupart n'ait pas résisté à l'épreuve du temps, ils recèlent encore des traces de l'ancienne magie chamanique de cette époque.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_181<tab>If you should happen upon anything when you are down there, pray bring it to me. I will see you duly compensated for your efforts.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_181<tab>J'ai le sentiment que les examiner pourrait me permettre d'élucider certains mystères qui entourent les ruines. Je compte donc sur vous pour me rapporter vos trouvailles. Je vous donnerai quelque chose en échange.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_200<tab>Aetherpool arms were crafted specifically to function within the labyrinth, and they only retain their form due to incantations I must apply daily. Without them, they will inevitably dissipate.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_200<tab>À mon avis, il devrait être possible de transformer les substrats magiques que j'ai créés en armes utilisables hors du Palais des morts. Mais pour cela, il est nécessaire de leur faire absorber une quantité importante d'éther...

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_201<tab>Hmmm... If I were to siphon a sufficient quantity of aether from one, perhaps it could be stabilized and fashioned into a weapon for use outside of the ruins.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_201<tab>... et pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment de les exposer à l'étrange atmosphère qui règne au plus profond des ruines gelmorraines. Je pourrais alors sûrement extraire une partie de cette énergie, la cristalliser et la modeler en arme.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>Upon clearing floor 50 of the Palace of the Dead, you will be allowed to forge an aetherpool grip, which can be used to exchange for aetherpool weapons to be used outside of the ruins.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_203<tab><var 2B ((<var 33 ((Item)) 02F25A7D0302 /var>)) /var> sont nécessaires pour créer une arme (ou arme et bouclier) padjale ou kinna et l'utiliser hors du Palais des morts.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_204<tab>Upon clearing floor 100, aetherpool grips can be exchanged for more powerful weapons.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_204<tab>La création d'<var 33 ((Item)) 02F25A7D0202 /var> consomme 10 degrés d'amélioration de chacun des deux substrats magiques.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_205<tab>Please note that creating an aetherpool grip will reduce the strength of your aetherpool arm and armor used inside the ruins by 10.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_205<tab>Pour cela et obtenir une arme padjale, vous devez préalablement avoir franchi le sous-sol 50 du Palais des morts.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_206<tab>Furthermore, this process can only be used to acquire weapons and shields. Aetherpool armor cannot be used outside the Palace of the Dead.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_206<tab>En ce qui concerne les armes kinna, il faut avoir dépassé le sous-sol 100.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_300<tab>As a Padjal of Gridania it is my duty to commune with the elementals, and so I have chosen to live here in the Shroud, that I might better interpret their will. In recent days, however, the winds whisper of an unnatural presence stirring here in the South Shroud.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_300<tab>Vous ne m'aviez pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment jamais rencontré jusqu'à présent, car je passe le plus clair de mon temps dans la forêt à écouter les esprits...

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_301<tab>The source being a strange labyrinth recently discovered in the ruins. Townsfolk have taken to calling it the Palace of the Dead. The Wood Wailers mean to explore its depths, and I would offer them what aid I can.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_301<tab>C'est justement eux qui m'ont appris que ces ruines gelmorraines auxquelles on donne le nom de Palais des morts avaient ressurgi du passé. J'ai donc décidé d'apporter mon soutien aux vigiles sombres et aux aventuriers comme vous pour les explorer.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_302<tab>When first surveying the labyrinth, I found it was protected by powerful magicks that would sap one's life energies the moment they step inside. Indeed, the mage who could erect such a warding spell unnoticed by the elementals must be possessed of terrible power.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_302<tab>J'ignore qui a créé l'étrange barrière magique qui réduit la force physique à l'intérieur de ces lieux, ni même comment cette personne ou entité est capable de résister aux esprits de la forêt, mais il ne fait aucun doute qu'elle est ex<var 16 /var>trê<var 16 /var>me<var 16 /var>ment puissante et dangereuse...

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_303<tab>Thankfully, I was able to devise a means to protect against the foul power of that place─aetherpool arms and armor.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_303<tab>Mais soyons optimistes. En analysant la nature de l'aura magique, j'ai réussi à mettre au point des substrats qui permettent d'utiliser l'éther de votre corps pour former une arme et une armure, et qui pourront être renforcés.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_304<tab>By channeling the wielder's energies into the weapon, rather than allowing them to be drained, one can brave those tenebrous halls and dispatch the fiends within. Should you wish to do so, I will gladly furnish you with these arms, for we would welcome any assistance you can offer.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_304<tab>Avec ça, vous devriez être capable de vous aventurer dans ces ruines sans courir trop de danger et de venir à bout des créatures qui y rôdent. En tout cas, n'hésitez pas à faire appel à mon aide lorsque vous en avez besoin.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_310<tab>As you are well aware, the Wood Wailers have been tasked with investigating the unnatural presence that has taken to Issom<var 1F /var>Har. I was summoned that we might better understand the magicks now permeating the ruins, and how to ward against them.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_310<tab>Je n'ai cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment plus besoin de me présenter, mais si vous insistez, sachez qu'en ma qualité de Padjal, j'ai décidé d'apporter mon soutien aux vigiles sombres et aux aventuriers comme vous pour explorer le Palais des morts.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_311<tab>Though the sorcerer behind the foul magicks of the labyrinth is vanquished, there is much to be done so long as the labyrinth remains. Nevertheless, we take solace in the knowledge that the greatest hindrance to our work is no more.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_311<tab>Bien que vous ayez vaincu le nécromancien qui en était à l'origine, ces lieux continuent d'exister. À nous donc de poursuivre notre enquête et de faire la lumière sur les nombreux mystères qui entourent ce labyrinthe souterrain.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_312<tab>Even the elementals grow quiet in the wake of his passing. Indeed, I imagine it will not be long before I can at last return home.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_312<tab>En tout cas, je sens que les esprits de la forêt ont retrouvé en grande partie leur sérénité habituelle. Cela veut sans doute dire que je vais bientôt pouvoir retourner à ma vie méditative au plus profond de la Sylve.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_313<tab>All this is possible thanks to your selfless actions. We should be glad of your continued assistance, and I, for my part, shall offer what aid I can through my aetherial armaments.
target: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_313<tab>Je tiens à vous remercier pour ce que vous avez fait jusqu'à présent. Sans vous, nous n'aurions jamais découvert l'origine du Palais des morts et encore moins éliminé celui qui l'a créé. Quelque part, je suis fier que mes substrats magiques vous aient été utiles dans cette mission.

source: TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_TEST_1<tab>Deleted
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_TEST_2<tab>Deleted
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_TEST_3<tab>Deleted
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_TEST_4<tab>Deleted
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_TEST_5<tab>Deleted
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_TEST_6<tab>Deleted
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_TEST_7<tab>Deleted
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_TEST_8<tab>Deleted
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_TEST_9<tab>Deleted
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_120<tab>You seem to be carrying rather a lot as it is. Might I suggest you see to your belongings first?

TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_150<tab>Have you not already acquired an arm suitable for <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>? I fail to see the value in seeking another.
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_EXCHANGE_MENU_GO<tab>
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_EXCHANGE_MENU_EXIT<tab>
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_101<tab>
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_111<tab>
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_202<tab>
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_EXCHANGE_TALK<tab>
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_EXCHANGE_OK<tab>
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_EXCHANGE_FULL<tab>
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_EXCHANGE_NOT_CLEARED<tab>
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_EXCHANGE_NOT_ENOGH<tab>
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_START_IS_NOT_OPENED<tab>
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_YES<tab>
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_NO<tab>
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_TEST_START_EVOLUTION<tab>Request to enhance your Padjali weapon.

TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_100<tab>You wish to use your aetherpool weapon <var 1A 02 /var>outside<var 1A 01 /var> the Palace of the Dead? Hmmm... It is clear you have channeled a considerable amount of aether into it after so many expeditions into the ruins. Perhaps its energies can be stabilized, thus no longer needing the aid of my magicks.

TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_102<tab>Only aetherpool weapons and shields can be converted for use outside of the Palace of the Dead. First select your desired class or job, then speak with E<var 1F /var>Una<var 1F /var>Kotor to receive a level 60 aetherpool weapon. Please note that paladins and gladiators will receive both a sword and shield.
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_110<tab>'Tis done! The aether has settled quite nicely. I pray it will serve you well in your travels.

TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_140<tab>You wish to use your aetherpool arm <var 1A 02 /var>outside<var 1A 01 /var> the Palace of the Dead? I'm afraid that is not possible. It was crafted specifically for combat within the ruins. Should you try to take it with you, it would likely dissipate.
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_141<tab>If you were to strengthen it further, perhaps in time it may be possible to stabilize the aetherial energies within it.

TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_145<tab>In order to use an aetherpool weapon outside the Palace of the Dead, both the aetherpool weapon and armor must have attained a strength of +30. However, please note that aetherpool armor cannot be used in this fashion.

TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_400<tab>Having explored the darkest depths of the Palace of the Dead, no doubt your aetherpool arms are now brimming with aetherial energy. It should be possible to harness that power to strengthen the arms we stabilized once before.

TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_402<tab>Utilizing the strength of your aetherpool gear, you can exchange Padjali weapons for an enhanced version known as <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>kinna weapons<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_403<tab>Please note that you must possess a Padjali weapon for your current class or job in order to complete the exchange. Moreover, the Padjali weapon must be in your armoury chest.

TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_POWERUP_EVOLUTION_MENU<tab>Enhance your Padjali weapon for <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>?
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The strength of your aetherpool arm and armor will be reduced by 60.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_405<tab>When you are ready, bring me your weapon and I shall bolster its strength.
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_410<tab>'Tis finished. The aether is stable, yet it burns more brightly than before. I pray it serves you well in your future endeavors.
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_430<tab>It gladdens my heart to know my weapons serve you well, even beyond the accursed halls of the ruins. With that said, I cannot grant your request.

TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_431<tab>To do so would deprive your aetherpool arms of strength, and you can ill afford to lose what little protection they offer. I sense a great many dangers yet await you, my friend. You must be prepared to face them.
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_432<tab>You must first clear floor 100 before you can enhance a Padjali weapon.

TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_440<tab>You wish to enhance the aetherpool weapon I stabilized once before? Hmmm... By siphoning sufficient energy from another aetherpool weapon, it should be possible. However, I fear the arms you presently use in the labyrinth would not supply the power I require.
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_EUNAKOTOR_000_441<tab>Pray continue your surveys of the Palace of the Dead and strengthen your aetherpool arms. Given time, they should take on energy suitable to our needs.
TEXT_DEEPDUNGEONREWARD_SYSTEM_000_445<tab>In order to enhance a Padjali weapon, both your aetherpool weapon and armor must have attained a strength of +60.
